alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:18PM EST until January 13 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and sleet expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Central Washington, Interior Hancock, and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 11 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Very strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
